rules_text:
Flying
At the beginning of your combat, choose one you haven't chosen –
• Teach target creature you control flying. [i](Put a flying counter on it. If it already has flying, put a +1/+1 counter on it instead.)[/i]
• Teach target creature you control lifelink.
• Teach target creature you control vigilance.
• Exile this creature, then return it to the battlefield.
